trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripRenderer1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderArrow>事件。

trans-unit.source: The graphics used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭头的图形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> on which to paint the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 要在其上绘制箭头的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭头的限定区域。

trans-unit.source: The color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭头的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭头指向的方向。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripArrowRenderEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> arrow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 箭头的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示箭头的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。
